name: Try Again
details: Players have ten attempts to complete a raid.

name: Persistence
details: Players have five attempts to complete a raid.

name: Softcore Run
details: Players have three attempts to complete a raid.

name: Hardcore Run
details: Players have one attempt to complete a raid.

name: Walk for It
details: Players have 40 minutes to complete the raid, including time spent between each Path.

name: Jog for It
details: Players have 35 minutes to complete the raid. If unsuccessful, the raid level will decrease by 30.

name: Run for It
details: Players have 30 minutes to complete the raid. If unsuccessful, the raid level will decrease by 40.

name: Sprint for It
details: Players have 25 minutes to complete the raid. If unsuccessful, the raid level will decrease by 50.

name: Need Some Help?
details: The quantity of items offered by the Helpful Spirit will be reduced to 66%.

name: Need Less Help?
details: The quantity of items offered by the Helpful Spirit will be reduced to 33%.

name: No Help Needed
details: The quantity of items offered by the helpful spirit will be reduced to 10%.

name: Walk the Path
details: Completing a path during the raid will cause other paths to level up.

name: Pathseeker
details: All paths will level up once upon entering the raid.

name: Pathfinder
details: All paths will level up twice upon entering the raid.

name: Pathmaster
details: All paths will level up three times upon entering the raid.

name: Quiet Prayers
details: Protection prayers will be 10% less effective within the raid.

name: Deadly Prayers
details: Prayer is drained by 20% of damage taken.

name: On a Diet
details: Players can no longer eat food within the raid, though potions that restore health (such as Saradomin brews) can still be used.

name: Dehydration
details: Players can no longer drink potions that restore health.

name: Overly Draining
details: All special attacks use 100% special attack energy.

name: Lively Larvae
details: The number of dark brown eggs launched during Kephri's Mass Incubation attack will increase from 2 to 4.

name: More Overlords
details: An additional scarab is summoned during Kephri's shield healing phases.

name: Blowing Mud
details: The number of players targeted by Kephri's Dung Strike attack is increased to two.

name: Medic!
details: Kephri will summon scarab swarms outside her shield healing phases.

name: Aerial Assault
details: Kephri's auto-attack will do more damage, and its attack range will increase from a single tile to a 3x3 area.

name: Not Just a Head
details: Zebak will occasionally cast a form of Blood Blitz on all players.

name: Arterial Spray
details: Zebak's blood magic will have increased range and healing.

name: Blood Thinners
details: Three Blood Clouds are summoned instead of one.

name: Upset Stomach
details: Zebak's acid pools will have increased spread, and jugs will only wash away a 3x3 area instead of 5x5.

name: Double Trouble
details: Akkha will perform two special attacks at once.

name: Keep Back
details: Akkha's ranged and magic attacks will also deal melee damage to anyone next to him.

name: Stay Vigilant
details: Akkha will randomly switch between attack styles and protection prayers, rather than at set intervals.

name: Feeling Special?
details: Akkha's Detonate attack will trigger in more directions.

name: Mind the Gap!
details: When Ba-Ba knocks back the player to the bottom of the room at 66% and 33% health, players will fall into the pit and die, unless they stand at the northern/southern sides of the room.

name: Gotta Have Faith
details: Energy blasts from open sarcophagi in Ba-Ba's room will deal additional damage based on the player's remaining prayer points.

name: Jungle Japes
details: Ba-Ba's baboons will drop a banana peel on the floor on death. If stepped on, players take a small amount of damage and is stunned for 3 seconds.

name: Shaking Things Up
details: The shockwave from Ba-Ba's slam attack will damage a wider area.

name: Boulderdash
details: Ba-Ba's rolling boulders will spawn slightly faster.

name: Ancient Haste
details: During the first phase of the Wardens' fight, the Wardens will charge at a faster rate.

name: Acceleration
details: During the second phase of the Wardens' fight, the Warden attacks faster while the obelisk charges faster.

name: Penetration
details: During the second phase of the Wardens' fight, the obelisk will deal more damage to successful attacks and also temporarily disable overhead prayers.

name: Overclocked
details: During the final phase of the Wardens' fight, the slam attack is performed 1 tick faster.

name: Overclocked 2
details: During the final phase of the Wardens' fight, the slam attack is performed 2 ticks faster.

name: Insanity
details: During the final phase of the Wardens' fight, the slam attack is performed 3 ticks faster, there is less time to reverse the Energy Siphons, the slam attack resumes based on where the Warden left off prior to launching Energy Siphons rather than resetting positions, and the red lightning strikes faster Each row of floor tiles are removed at a faster pace.
